body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Members of this race gain a +2 racial bonus on Appraise and Perception checks to find hidden objects (including traps and secret doors), determine whether food is spoiled, or identify a potion by taste.
name: Scavenger
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Feat and Skill Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Scavenger
